meta.title: Feeding Students During School Closures - Wayne RESA

meta.name: description
meta.content: Feeding Students During School Closures - Wayne RESA

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Feeding During School Closure, Wayne RESA, coronavirus, school closures, free meals
Feeding Students During School Closures - Wayne RESA
Feeding Students During School Closures - Wayne RESA

body.class: fsLiveMode fsHasHeader fsHasMenu fsHasFooter fsHasOneColumnLayout fsSection335 fsHasTheme2

li.a: Wayne County RESA Intermediate School District Annual Website Report 2018-2019
Wayne County RESA Intermediate School District Annual Website Report 2017-2018
Equity, School Culture and Cultural Competence
Child and Student Education Referral Form
Mathematics Assessment System for the Essential Elements
Pacing Guides, Templates and Report Cards
K-12 Balanced Literacy and Assessment System

div.div: About Us Wayne RESA is a regional educational service agency that provides a broad range of services and support to Wayne County's 33 school districts.
Administrative Support Wayne RESA provides numerous administrative support services that help districts function.

img.alt: Two people looking at laptops and notebooks

div.div:
Teaching and Learning Wayne RESA provides best-practice curriculum and instruction support to 33 local school districts to help them provide high-quality learning experiences for their students. Additionally, there are 108 Public School Academies (PSAs) serving 64,000 students in Wayne County.
Wayne RESA has also developed a remote learning toolkit with educational resources for school and family use during the emergency school closures.
Professional Development Wayne RESA provides research-backed, best-practice professional development to educators, administrators, and staff to grow district capacity.

img.alt: Three adults speaking with each other

div.div: Community Wayne RESA builds strong connections with the Wayne County community to help our students, schools, and families thrive. We believe that community connection is vital in education today.

ul.li: Feeding Students During School Closures

div.class: fsDiv fsStyleTwoThirds fsStyleColumn fsStyleColumn-2 fsStyleColumn-last fsStyleAutoclear

div.p: For the most up-to-date information on meal distribution plans, please visit the school district's website. A list of school districts in Wayne County, and the links to their websites, can be found on Wayne RESA's district listing page.
Wayne RESA has compiled a list of locations in Wayne County providing free meals for students during the emergency school closures. You can view the list as:

a.title: Alphabetical listing of meal service locations

div.p: Please read the details of the location carefully. For more detailed information about the food services of each organization, contact the organization directly.

p.strong: Please check back periodically. We will regularly update this page as more information becomes available.

div.p: If you are on a mobile device, you can scroll left and right to see the entire table.

table.summary: School districts providing free meals during emergency school closures
